description:
Ritsu Onodera hated the fact that people claimed he only got into his father`s company because he was the son and promptly quits. He starts his new job at Marukawa Publishing house but ends up in a department for shojo manga, something he`s neither interested nor experienced in. To make matters worse, the first impression he gets from the high handed editor in chief Masamune Takano is terrible...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: First Impressions Are the Most Lasting
First Impressions Are the Most Lasting.
First impressions are the most lasting.
